backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and CRUD project storage with design elements.
feature_evidence.json: Feature‑evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and theme provider for the main app.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users for their name and saving the profile via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/designer/BaseCol: Popover color picker for selecting garment base color with presets and custom input.
frontend/src/components/designer/DesignC: Renders a garment design canvas, draws elements with transformations, and manages selection and drag interactions.
frontend/src/components/designer/ExportD: Exports the current garment design to PNG using a template and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/designer/Garment: Dropdown selector allowing users to choose the garment type.
frontend/src/components/designer/LayersP: Displays design elements as layers and allows selecting and reordering them.
frontend/src/components/designer/Onboard: Shows dismissible onboarding tips stored in client persistence.
frontend/src/components/designer/Selecti: Provides controls for duplicating, deleting, resizing, and rotating the selected design element.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header navigation, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/logo-maker/LogoC: Renders a transparent-background logo canvas with text and shape elements.
UI panel to add text, shapes, or uploaded images to the logo maker.
frontend/src/components/logo-maker/LogoE: Exports the composed logo as PNG or adds it to the main design.
frontend/src/components/projects/NewProj: Modal form for creating a project with name, garment type, and base color, calling createProject and navigating to the designer.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Displays a grid of user projects with open and delete actions, including confirmation dialogs and date formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile through the backend actor with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: React-query hooks for CRUD operations on projects, using the actor and invalidating related caches.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for themes, colors, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point initializing React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DesignerPage.tsx: Designer workspace page that loads a project into state, allows editing, and saves updates using updateProject.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, navigation buttons, and feature cards for the design tools.
frontend/src/pages/LogoMakerPage.tsx: Logo creation page with canvas, controls, export button, and option to add logos to designer state.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectGalleryPage.ts: Displays authenticated user's project list with loading state and new project dialog.
frontend/src/state/designerTypes.ts: Defines garment types, design element structure, and overall designer state model.
Converts backend project data into a partial DesignerState with mapped element properties.
frontend/src/state/useDesignerState.ts: Zustand store managing garment settings, design elements, selection, ordering, and state loading.
frontend/src/utils/clientPersistence.ts: Utility for safe localStorage get/set with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/exportDesignPng.ts: Generates a PNG of the design by drawing the garment template and elements onto a canvas and downloading it.
frontend/src/utils/garmentTemplates.ts: Provides garment template metadata and a helper to retrieve templates by type.
frontend/src/utils/imageImport.ts: Validates uploaded images and returns their data URL via FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with theme extensions, plugins, and custom color system.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, existing features, and required garment images for a clothing design web app.
